name: BiC Hybrid Advance 4 Disposable Shaver Handle & Cartridges

reviews.name: BiC Hybrid Advance 4 Disposable Shaver Handle & Cartridges
reviews.reviewText: I was Looking for an inexpensive razor that performs well; this is it. Smooth shave, durable, and cost efficient. Looks cool too !
reviews.title: Great Shave

reviews.name: BiC Hybrid Advance 4 Disposable Shaver Handle & Cartridges
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many different brands and styles of razors over the years and none compare to this razor. I not only shave my face but my head as well and this razor does an excellent job on both. Being half the price of my old razor, NO one can go wrong with this one!!
reviews.title: 07 September 2012

reviews.name: BiC Hybrid Advance 4 Disposable Shaver Handle & Cartridges
reviews.reviewText:
I have used Gillette Fusion razors and cartridges for years now, finding them the most comfortable and (generally) effective blade/handle system on the market. They are also ridiculously overpriced. But if one wanted a decent, comfortable, shave, then one was forced to pay the piper. Until now. On a lark, I picked up a Bic Hybrid Advance 4 just to give it a try. Glad I did. While it is not *quite* as smooth a shaving experience as the Gillette, I think the Bic system actually shaves better. The blade "bite" or angle of attack seems to do better at getting stubborn neck whiskers around my protrusive adam's apple and the flexible head handles facial gullies better. I do tend to nick myself a bit more than with the Gillette, which is superb in that regard, but the closer shave and the better price are worth it. Good razor, cheaper blades, what's not to love? This thing is going to save me some money.

Please note one thing: Bic does not sell blade refills by themselves at this time. Each time you buy blades, you get a new handle. It is plastic and fairly cheaply constructed, but I think Bic would be wise to sell a heavier metal handle and then allow us to buy large packs of blade cartridges.
reviews.title: The razor that rescued me from Gillette Fusion

reviews.name: BiC Hybrid Advance 4 Disposable Shaver Handle & Cartridges
reviews.reviewText: The dimensions of the handle and the disposable razors do not match. So it is impossible to get the handle and razor attached. Somebody at Bic got their numbers wrong.
reviews.title: Do not buy this razor!

reviews.name: BiC Hybrid Advance 4 Disposable Shaver Handle & Cartridges
reviews.reviewText: having tried the disposable BIC 4 blade shavers, I was eager to try these. The razor provides a great, close shave.
reviews.title: Great shavers, at a better price than Gilette
